title: JW Marriott Las Vegas Resort & Spa Celebrates Major Renovation Project Just In Time For Fall
text:
JW Marriott Las Vegas Resort & Spa
Las Vegas luxury resort offers nightly $50 resort credit to celebrate completion of remodel
LAS VEGAS , Oct. 15, It's all new at JW Marriott Las Vegas Resort & Spa . From fresh paint and wallpaper to brand new furniture and decor, updates abound throughout the entire luxury hotel.
To celebrate the major renovation project, guests can book accommodations now through Oct. 31, 2015 to receive a $50 resort credit for each night they stay between now and Nov. 22, 2015 .
The refreshed resort offers a private desert retreat just minutes from the Las Vegas Strip and is located in the heart of Summerlin, an upscale golf and shopping community considered the "Scottsdale of Las Vegas ." The golf resort is just steps from Tivoli Village, a high-end shopping, dining and cultural event center that is soon adding stores including Restoration Hardware and H&M. Also nearby is Downtown Summerlin, featuring additional fashion outlets, dining and entertainment as well as upscale office and residential spaces.
Boasting on-site dining and a full-service spa as well as a partnership with TPC Las Vegas golf course , guests can plan fun-filled experiences away from the hustle and bustle of the city. With the on-site Rampart Casino , gamblers will appreciate new slot machines, a 300-seat Bingo room, renovated VIP Player Lounge and improved air quality at the casino, conveniently connected to the resort.
For an outdoor experience, visitors can lounge at the waterfall pool, which now features new seat cushions and updated cabanas. Bocce ball, a volleyball court and horse shoe pit are also available for some stress-free fun in the sun.
Morning, noon or night, visitors are invited to dine at one of the resort's restaurants and load up on caffeine at the on-site Starbucks. As part of the hotel's comprehensive renovations, JC Irish Pub now features new big-screen TVs and an enhanced sound system for watching any sports games while enjoying favorites such as bangers and mash or Shepard's pie.
After an action-packed day or peaceful poolside rest, guests who book now will be some of the first to experience the resort's renovated guest rooms and suites . Visitors will enjoy updates to paint, wallpaper, bathroom tiles, vanity mirrors, wall decor, lighting, bedding and headboards in each of the rooms for a more sophisticated stay.
As one of the premier luxury Las Vegas resorts, JW Marriott Las Vegas provides 100,000 square feet of event space and meeting rooms for corporate gatherings or wedding and social celebrations . These sophisticated spaces now boast new decor and directional signage for event attendees.
Travelers wishing to check out the hotel's new accommodations and save a little money with the special Fall Break-Away Deal must book online or by calling 1-800-228-9290 and using promotional code ZX0. The resort credit is available to use in select outlets and cannot be applied to room rate, resort fees or be redeemed for cash.
To see the resort's renovated spaces, check out their YouTube channel.
About JW Marriott Las Vegas Resort & Spa
JW Marriott Las Vegas Resort & Spa at 221 N. Rampart Blvd. in Las Vegas, NV is near the Las Vegas Strip, award-winning golf courses and Red Rock National Park. The resort features 6 floors with 469 rooms, 79 suites, 33 meeting rooms totaling 100,000 square feet of space, a casino, full-service spa, multiple restaurants, an outdoor pool and state-of-the-art fitness center. For information, visit www.marriott.com/LASJW or call 1-702-869-7777.
